appInstalled.title: Application missing
appInstalled.message: Please make sure you have {{type}} app installed
appInstalled.noAppMessage: Plase make sure you have at least one of Google Maps, Apple Maps or Waze installed

cannotUpgrade.title: Download failed
cannotUpgrade.message: There was a problem downloading the app. Please try again or manually select a version using the link below.

cannotOpenUrl.title: Link failed
cannotOpenUrl.message: There was a problem opening the link.

clipboard.title: Error code copied to clipboard
clipboard.description: Simply paste in the app of your choosing and send the crashcode to your supervisor. Thanks!

driverData.title: Error getting route data
driverData.message: Try refreshing route data again. If the problem persists, contact your supervisor.
driverData.refreshMessage: Tap this message to reload route data. If the problem persists, contact your supervisor.

failed.title: Error synchronising data
failed.message: Your work may be lost unless it is pushed to the server or sent to support. Tap to retry

mustComplyWithTerms.title: Missing requirements
mustComplyWithTerms.message: You need to comply with all terms to start your shift

proofOfDeliveryRequired.title: Proof of delivery required!
proofOfDeliveryRequired.message: Please take your phone with you and take a picture once you've delivered the products.

deliverLater.title: Deliver later?
deliverLater.description: Pin will be removed from sequence
deliverLater.confirmation: Unoptimised and "Deliver later" drops will always be visible on the map. Manually select them when you're close by.

online.title: Back online!
online.message: Any work that you’ve done while offline is now being synced with the server.

biometrics.title: Disable biometrics?
biometrics.message: By disabling biometric authentication you will need to login with your email and password in the future.

logout.title: Why log out?
logout.message: There's no need to log out of the Driver app. Simply open the app later on to check on updated or new routes assigned to you.

directions.title: Delivery directions unavailable!
directions.message: You’ve turned on delivery directions. The feature will automatically turn on whenever you come back online.

logout.title: Proceed with caution
logout.message: Logging out while offline will clear all route data on the device and you will no longer be able to continue working until the device is back online.

start.title: Synchronising failed data to support!
start.message: Some of your work wasn't saved successfully. Please wait...

completed.title: Data pushed to support!
completed.message: Your work has been successfully saved. Good night!

completed.title: Successfully pushed all your offline data!
completed.message: All work data has been successfully pushed to the server. Tap to dismiss.
